about_the_game:
One day, country-man Bell receives a letter from his dearest friend: Lumia. She left their hometown to fulfill her greatest dream: Becoming a singer, a popular idol bringing love and hope to people all around the world. Attached to the letter is a ticket for her next concert, an unspoken invitation to come and visit her in person.

Bell takes the long journey by ship, given five days’ time before the next ship will return him back home again. Five days for one love, Bell has to make every day count if he wants his own dream to become reality: For Lumia to accept his confession.

He isn’t alone in his quest though, with Lumia’s beauty being as alluring as her voice, her body and heart are sought after by other people as well. If he doesn’t act fast enough, someone else might steal her away right in front of his eyes...






You play as Bell, having five days to make the best out of your visit before a return ship will take you back home again. During this time, you can freely roam through the cozy port town of Loft, go on dates with Lumia, watch her perform on stage or peep on whatever she might be doing behind closed curtains…

Whether you strive for pure or tainted love, for romance or heartbreak, the various possible routes cover a wide range of kinks.



  • Achievements: Track your progress via a number of achievements both in the game and as Steam Achievements!
  • A day and night cycle: Time advances during events and by entering and leaving buildings, from morning to evening to night and midnight. Time can also be advanced manually, with different events happening at different times of the day.
  • Multiple endings: Will the love between Bell and Lumia deepen or will their bond of former days wilt in the embrace of someone else? Your decisions will determine their future.
  • Disbird: It might be wise of Bell to check this social-messaging app for the latest news about a certain, popular girl in town…
  • Reminiscence room: Every naughty scene can be replayed again in the reminiscence room for a comfortable experience – including Lumia’s point of view and a full-unlock switch!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

Scenes of sexual assault/non-consensual sex are present in the game.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Countdown to NTR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

short_description: Five days. That’s all the time Bell has to confess his true feelings to Lumia, beautiful singer and love of his life. She left their hometown in pursuit of her dreams – can Bell become a part of her dreams, or will someone else charm Lumia's heart? Let the countdown begin!
